articles.author: Jose Alvarez, Sandi Sidhu, Fidel Gutierrez, David Shortell, Michael Rios
articles.title: Bodies, pickup truck found in Mexican region where American and Australian tourists went missing, sources say - CNN
articles.description: Three bodies were found Friday in the Mexican region where an American and two Australians have been missing for several days, multiple sources told CNN.
articles.content:
Three bodies were found Friday in the Mexican region where an American and two Australians have been missing for several days, multiple sources told CNN.
